title: Expecting empty properties to be returned as null values when creating a RACE TRACK
gherkin:
When the user creates a "RACE TRACK" "Lausitzring" with the following data
  | key | value | datatype |
  | name | Lausitzring | string |
Then the response should contain the following properties
  | key | value | datatype |
  | name | Lausitzring | string |
  | opened | | number |
  | closed | | number |
  | type | | string |
  | location | | string |
  | geo_position | | string |
